text: oh we were ignored for so long and even
now the response has been so anemic
bosses Oh Lord you talk to the rest of
the country and they think this is fixed
and they think we're okay and they don't
realize this is a day two days till to
brush your teeth to wash your hands to
wash your face to cook your meals to
make your coffee we want to turn on our
taps like everybody else and not be
poisoned it's not a lot to ask
